On Wed, 21 Aug 2002, dph_of_rules wrote:

> I'll add a couple of more things.  Some of the cheat codes didn't
> work: the cheat code for tranforming to another character type caused
> the program to crash.  Also, the cheat code for boosting/lowering
> experience level caused the game to crash.  The cheat code for
> adding/subtracting additional funds didn't work.  Everything else
> seemed to work.

Yup, those bugs were in the Linux version too. It was actually because of
the way Gladiator handled input on DOS. They're fixed in CVS now.

BTW, if anyone has Visual C++ and wants to compile the source, the latest
from CVS compiles under Windows with no trouble anymore. There are
directions in the INSTALL file.

>
> Yes, the sound works.

Yup. Only things broken under windows now seem to be fullscreen and
joysticks.

- Zardus
